text: Introduced to the idea of Programming - via Scratch - in the digitial class at my school.
After a while of strictly using Scratch, I started learning HTML and CSS.
Inspired by the many bots on Discord, I started to learn JavaScript, with the goal of making my own bot.
After nearly a year of on and off programming, I completed my first Discord bot.
Bought a Raspberry Pi, with the intend of self hosting the few bots I made.
Resumed my learning of HTML and CSS, making dashboard websites for my bots.
Participated in multiple Programming short courses at Techtorium NZIIT, where I learnt Visual Basic.
Learnt React, and used it to create a couple of websites, including my personal website at the time.
Also learnt React Native, making a couple of mobile apps.
Started studying at Yoobee Colleges, working towards a Diploma in Software Development.
Learnt Vue, and used it to rewrite my personal website.
